long_description: The Outdoor Recliner(TM) chair from GCI Outdoor lets you kick back, relax and soak up the sun on a warm day. Its patent-pending reclining backrest features 3 different reclining positions to maximize your comfort. Patent-pending tension bar enhances comfort and stability while you're reclined. Outdoor Recliner(TM) is easy to open, close, carry and store; includes a zippered carry bag with backpack straps. Powder-coated steel frame is sturdy and strong; supports up to 250 lbs.
short_description: The Outdoor Recliner(TM) chair from GCI Outdoor lets you kick back, relax and soak up the sun on a warm day.
